traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The velociraptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage.
